resources.string: Welcome to the world of Android development! Are you ready to learn this fascinating and interesting world?
It has never been so fun and interesting to study programming as playing.We worked out a system of exercises so that you do not get bored for a minute and enjoy the learning process
For each task you complete, you get experience points and increase your level! Good luck!
We are recommend to start with it
We suggest starting with these lessons
This section contains the whole theory that you learn in the lessons.
Strengthen your knowledge by doing these exercises
